markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3394) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 126</row>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Your training in the wrestling arts has made you particularly adept at moving, striking, and grappling while unencumbered. You become an expert in Athletics and gain the [Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=854) skill feat. You don't take the –2 circumstance penalty for making a lethal attack with your [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) unarmed attacks. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude DC when resisting an opponent's attempts to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) you or [Swallow you Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35).

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the wrestler archetype.

<title level="2">Wrestler Dedication leads to...</title>
[Aerial Piledriver](/Feats.aspx?ID=3402), [Clinch Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3398), [Disengaging Twist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3395), [Elbow Breaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=3396), [Form Lock (Wrestler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3405), [Inescapable Grasp](/Feats.aspx?ID=3404), [Running Tackle](/Feats.aspx?ID=3399), [Spinebreaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=3403), [Strangle](/Feats.aspx?ID=3400), [Submission Hold](/Feats.aspx?ID=3401), [Suplex](/Feats.aspx?ID=3397)
name: Wrestler Dedication
